WorkspaceSid.description: The SID of the Workspace with the Task Channel to update.

Sid.description: The SID of the Task Channel resource to update.

ChannelOptimizedRouting.description: Whether the TaskChannel should prioritize Workers that have been idle. If `true`, Workers that have been idle the longest are prioritized.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the Task Channel. It can be up to 64 characters long.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Task Channel resource.
**channel_optimized_routing**: Whether the Task Channel will prioritize Workers that have been idle. When `true`, Workers that have been idle the longest are prioritized.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Task Channel resource.
**unique_name**: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the Task Channel, such as `voice` or `sms`.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Task Channel resource.
**workspace_sid**: The SID of the Workspace that contains the Task Channel.
